title: Captain Cook
episode_desc: Captain Blackadder spots an opportunity to get away from the trenches when General Melchett announces a painting competition for the cover of "King and Country" magazine.
show_desc: Stuck in the middle of World War I, Captain Edmund Blackadder does his best to escape the banality of the war.

title: Corporal Punishment
episode_desc: Blackadder hatches a cunning plan to avoid starvation and ignore his orders by eating a carrier pigeon.
show_desc: Stuck in the middle of World War I, Captain Edmund Blackadder does his best to escape the banality of the war.

title: Major Star
episode_desc: Blackadder sees an opportunity to escape the trenches by organizing a variety show as entertainment for the troops.
show_desc: Stuck in the middle of World War I, Captain Edmund Blackadder does his best to escape the banality of the war.

title: Private Plane
episode_desc: Blackadder and his friends join the Air Corps, wrongly believing it will be less dangerous than being in the trenches.
show_desc: Stuck in the middle of World War I, Captain Edmund Blackadder does his best to escape the banality of the war.

title: General Hospital
episode_desc: The General asks Blackadder to find a spy in the hospital; one of the patients has a thick German accent and an interest in all things military.
show_desc: Stuck in the middle of World War I, Captain Edmund Blackadder does his best to escape the banality of the war.

title: Goodbyeee
episode_desc: Blackadder pretends that he's insane to avoid certain death carrying out the General's order for the "big push".
show_desc: Stuck in the middle of World War I, Captain Edmund Blackadder does his best to escape the banality of the war.
